CustomField.description: This field specifies in text description of the applicant’s or borrower’s Other Pacific Islander race(s) if 44 (Other Pacific Islander) is entered.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Other Pacific Islander is selected as a Race, this text field allows you to specify the Other Pacific Islander race(s). You may enter up to 50 characters.
CustomField.label: Other Pacific Islander race(s)
